name: Bouxy
description:
Bouxy is a 2D rage platformer where you play as a bouncy box and control it by shooting it into your mouse cursor (or your finger, in case of mobile).
(The title means bouncy+box)

Inspired by Getting Over It, Golfing Over It and Stick With It

How to play:

  • Mouse: use the mouse cursor to aim, left click or space to shoot
  • Gamepad: use left or right stick to aim, (A) (on Xbox gamepad) to shoot
  • Touchscreen (mobile): tap and drag your finger to aim, release to shoot
  • Get to the very top of the level!

I made this game in 4 days because I was bored so yeah
